snippet: The Potomack Company auction house has listed the small pastel-colored painting as Renoir's "Paysage Bords de Seine" and is scheduled to auction off the work on Sept. 29.
abstract: The Potomack Company auction house has listed the small pastel-colored painting as Renoir's "Paysage Bords de Seine" and is scheduled to auction off the work on Sept. 29.

headline.main: A Possible Renoir Surfaces at a Virginia Flea Market
